message.reasoning_content: 补丁格式有问题。我需要直接修改文件。让我使用 sed 或直接重新生成文件。

function.arguments: {"cmd":"cd /Users/fanzhang/Documents/github/webauto && cat services/unified-api/index.js | sed '/this.app.post.*controller.action/,/res.json(result);/{\n/res.json(result);/i\\\n\\\n        // Broadcast events for specific actions (same as /v1/containers/match)\\\n        if (action === '\\''containers:match'\\'') {\\\n          if (result?.success && result?.data) {\\\n            this.broadcastEvent('\\''containers.matched'\\'', {\\\n              success: true,\\\n              matched: true,\\\n              snapshot: result.data\\\n            });\\\n            if (result.data?.dom_tree) {\\\n              this.broadcastEvent('\\''dom.tree'\\'', {\\\n                tree: result.data.dom_tree,\\\n                url: result.data?.url || payload?.url,\\\n                timestamp: Date.now()\\\n              });\\\n            }\\\n          } else {\\\n            this.broadcastEvent('\\''containers.matched'\\'', {\\\n              success: false,\\\n              matched: false,\\\n              error: result?.error || '\\''Unknown error'\\''\\\n            });\\\n          }\\\n        }\n}' > services/unified-api/index.js.tmp && mv services/unified-api/index.js.tmp services/unified-api/index.js && echo \"修改完成\""}
function.name: exec_command

headers.vary: Accept-Encoding, Origin, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers, Origin, Access-Control-Request-Method, Access-Control-Request-Headers
